snippet: The Yankees hired Jim Hendry, who was fired as the Chicago Cubs’ general manager in August, as a special-assignment scout.
abstract: New York Yankees hire former Chicago Cubs general manager Jim Hendry as a special-assignment scout; team promotes Steve Donahue to succeed retired Gene Monahan as head athletic trainer.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees hired Jim Hendry, who was fired as the Chicago Cubs’ general manager in August, as a special-assignment scout.
